elements.name: additionalDocsExplanation
elements.html: Based on your answers, you must file the following additional documents with your Application About a Family Law Matter:

elements.name: isFilingAdditionalDocs
elements.title: Will you be able to file the required additional forms with your application?
elements.description: Note: This service does not currently support the completion of the forms listed above. You can complete the fillable PDFs and upload them during the Review and File step to file with this service.

elements.name: fileApplicationFAQ
elements.title: What happens if I canâ€™t file the form with my application?
elements.body: You may still be allowed to file your application without the required additional forms listed above, but you will need permission from the court to do so. To get permission, you must complete an Application for Case Management Order Without Notice or Attendance Form 11. If you select case management order in Step 1 Get Started, this service will help complete the form.

elements.name: unableFileForms
elements.title: Select each form you will be unable to file with your Application About a Family Law Matter?
choices: Completed Consent for Child Protection Record Check Form 5 Family Law Act Regulation
Completed Request for protection order registry search form

elements.name: appointedAsGuardianExplanation
elements.title: Parenting Time
elements.html:
As part of your application for guardianship of a child, you must complete a Guardianship Affidavit Form 5. It does not need to be filed with your application but there are steps you need to take so you can file it. In addition to the Child Protection Record Check results and Protection Order Registry search results which you are requesting with the documents above, you must also attach a copy of your criminal record check.

To get a criminal record check, ask at the police station or RCMP detachment in your community.

elements.name: criminalChecked
elements.title: Will you have initiated or completed your criminal record check before filing your application?

elements.name: appointedAsGuardianExplanation
elements.title:
You may still be allowed to file your application without the required additional documents or requirements listed above, but you will need permission from the court to do so. To get permission, you must complete an Application for Case Management Order Without Notice or Attendance Form 11. If you select case management order in Step 1 Get Started, this service will help complete the form.
The Application for Case Management Order Without Notice or Attendance Form 11 must be submitted with your Application About a Family Law Matter.
